DOC.brief_summary: It control clinical trial randomize , double-blind evaluator . Will consider eligible patient , individual sex , age 40 -60 , submit least four item knee osteoarthrosis classification criterion , accord American College Rheumatology , pain four point visual analogue scale ( VAS ) , diagnose knee osteoarthritis seek physical therapy treatment . Patients randomize number sequence generate computer use Microsoft Excel ( Microsoft Corporation , Redmond , Washington ) , opaque envelop researcher attend study.Patients divide two group : group knee patellar hole group without knee patellar hole . Shortly selection knee , patient eye blind cover order keep `` blind `` regard type knee brace would use . Finally evaluator 1 cover knee black cloak , make second evaluator `` blind `` regard type knee brace use . Two investigator carry data collection . The first evaluator collect information clinical characteristic patient , include evaluation form , numerical pain scale , measure intensity pain , test Time Up Go ( TUG ) test measure basic mobility movement test walk eight meter , whose purpose measure time individual take walk distance eight meter .
DOC.brief_title: Assessment Knee Brace Patients With Osteoarthritis
